mapper.select: SELECT c_id, c_p_id, c_b_id, c_writer, LPAD('re: ', 4*(LEVEL-1), 're: ') || c_subject AS c_subject FROM tbl_comment WHERE c_b_id = #{c_b_id} START WITH c_p_id = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR c_id = c_p_id ORDER SIBLINGS BY c_p_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment( C_ID, C_B_ID, C_P_ID, C_DATE_TIME, C_WRITER, C_SUBJECT ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{c_b_id}, #{c_p_id}, #{c_date_time}, #{c_writer}, #{c_subject} )
